metadata.title: CVE-2020-27780 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Linux-Pam in versions prior to 1.5.1 in the way ithandle empty passwords for non-existing users. When the user doesn't existPAM try to authenticate with root and in the case of an empty password itsuccessfully authenticate.

criterions.comment: pam: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
